name: pitch-class
description: Get pitch class of a note or midi number

scripts.build: npm test && npm run docs && npm run coverage && npm run disc && npm run dist
scripts.dist: mkdir -p tmp/ && browserify index.js | uglifyjs > tmp/pitch-class.min.js&& ls -hall tmp/
scripts.disc: mkdir -p tmp/ && browserify --full-paths index.js | uglifyjs | discify > tmp/disc.html

author: danigb
